title: "German Chancellor Olaf Scholz could snub British AI summit"
excerpt: "German Chancellor Olaf Scholz may turn down his invitation to a major UK summit on artificial intelligence, the BBC understands. The government is hosting an event aimed at tech leaders, academics and political leaders to discuss AI safety on 1 November."
